name: Dinosaur Adventure beta
description:
Welcome to Dinosaur Adventure! This in-early-development game is all about surviving as long as you can. build a rocky base, eat apples, slash some enemies!

Click here to see the game downloads :)

Check out the beast book in the game by pressing the book icon in the main menu!

Press the light bulb to get an idea on how to play! (please press it)

In game, look at the bottom-left corner to see how to do certain things in the game when possible!

No end yet, for now just survive!

CREDITS: 

PIXEL-BOY for ninja adventure, used for one of the enemies

KREEPE for assets for upcoming enemies

PISKEL and MS PAINT 3D as programs for asset making

4IAN for gdevelop

CONTROLS

wasd or arrows to  move

x to attack an enemy or delete a chicken

v to create a chicken

(press the light bulb for a full list of controls or check the bottom left corner in game)

- WASD SUPPORT!!!!
